list_definition.definition: the beginning or origin of something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The Space Shuttle concept had its genesis in the 1960s.

Critical analysis involves questioning the genesis and justification of patient selection criteria, as well as considering their meaning and impact in the relevant policy domain.
